mapper.insert: insert into t_menu_table (menuCode, menuName, menuUrl, level, sortNo, gmtCreate, createBy, is_deleted, version ) values ( #{menuCode}, #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{level}, #{sortNo}, now(), #{createBy}, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select role from t_sys_user where user_code=#{userId}
mapper.update: update t_menu_table set is_deleted=1, gmtModified=now(), lastModifiedBy=#{userId}, version=version+1 where menuCode=#{menuCode}
